"Looks like you're okay.": "Thank goodness! When Dark Falz caught you, we didn't know what to do!"
"I, for one, am also very glad to see that you're okay."
"However, we weren't able to defeat Dark Falz... Thanks entirely to my own unpreparedness. I'm sorry."
"We're moving our plan forward immediately, so I'd like you to rest up and await further details."
"Thank you. For protecting Central City--for protecting Halpha."
